title.rendered: Play Playstation 4 online – play PS4 for free?

content.rendered:
Some innovations have come with the PlayStation 4, and free online gambling seems to be over. We’ll enlighten you.

PlayStation 4: Free online gaming still possible?

In the PS3 era, gamers could play any game online without paying extra. Since the PS4, however, Sony has been approaching the system of Microsoft’s Xbox and is making the PlayStation Network (PSN) largely chargeable.

  • A PS Plus subscription is now required so that you can play all your games online as usual. This costs around 50 euros per year and gives you online access to the games.
  • You can only play games that are already available for free without the PS Plus subscription. This currently includes only a few games, such as “Planetside 2”.
  • Conclusion: In order to finance the comparatively cheap console, Sony has to break new ground. This seems to be one of the reasons why you now need a subscription to play online. At around 4 euros per month, this will probably scare off almost no gamer.

Whether you can play your PS3 games on your PS4, read this practical tip.
